item.title: Getting started with windows-10-universal
item.description: Creating a new project (C# / XAML) # After launching Visual Studio 2015, go to File → New → Project. In the New Project dialog box, browse in the templates tree to Visual C# → Windows → Universal and select Blank App (Universal Windows). Next, we need to fill the form to describe the Application: Name: this is the name of the application which will be displayed to the user. Set it to HelloWorld or use a custom title.
